description.de: Governance-Profil für Dokumente mit Bezug zur Industrie- und Handelskammer. Operationelle Formulare, Bescheinigungen, Ausbildungsdokumente und Handelspapiere. 79 regionale IHKs als Körperschaften des öffentlichen Rechts.
description.en: Governance profile for documents referencing Chambers of Commerce and Industry. Operational forms, certifications, training documents and trade papers. 79 regional IHKs as public-law bodies.
description.pt: Perfil de governança para documentos referentes às Câmaras de Comércio e Indústria. Formulários operacionais, certificados, documentos de formação e papéis comerciais. 79 IHKs regionais como órgãos de direito público.

institutional_context.legal_basis: IHKG (Gesetz zur vorläufigen Regelung des Rechts der Industrie- und Handelskammern)

disclaimer.de: Dieses Dokument wurde NICHT von einer Industrie- und Handelskammer erstellt oder autorisiert. Es enthält Bezüge zu einer realen Institution. Governance-Stufe: LOW.
disclaimer.en: This document was NOT created or authorized by a Chamber of Commerce and Industry. It contains references to a real institution. Governance level: LOW.
disclaimer.pt: Este documento NÃO foi criado ou autorizado por uma Câmara de Comércio e Indústria. Contém referências a uma instituição real. Nível de governança: LOW.

institution_name.description: Name of the specific IHK (e.g. IHK Schwaben, IHK München)

member_facing.description: Whether the document is intended for member companies

version_control.description: Version tracking optional for operational documents

ai_role.description: AI assists with operational documents. Official certificates and exams require human authority.

operational_templates.description: Common IHK document templates that WINDI can assist with

templates.name: Ursprungszeugnis-Antrag
templates.description: Application form for certificate of origin

risk_profile.mitigation_strategy: Template standardization, basic audit trail, form validation

windi_positioning.de: WINDI unterstützt bei der Erstellung und Verwaltung operationeller IHK-Dokumente. WINDI erstellt keine amtlichen Bescheinigungen. WINDI standardisiert Formularprozesse und gewährleistet Nachvollziehbarkeit.
windi_positioning.en: WINDI assists with creation and management of operational IHK documents. WINDI does not issue official certificates. WINDI standardizes form processes and ensures traceability.
windi_positioning.pt: WINDI auxilia na criação e gestão de documentos operacionais da IHK. WINDI não emite certificados oficiais. WINDI padroniza processos de formulários e garante rastreabilidade.
